description: This trail is designed for XC/Trail Riders that love a great scenic ride with some good hills to climb and descend.Located in the Don Getty Wildland Provincial Park Southwest of Longview, AB. This is an excellent area as there are No-Motorized Vehicles allowed.
directions: From Calgary, AB		1. Head south to Longview, AB            Take Hwy 22 or Deerfoot/AB 2 Hwy South	2. Turn West onto Hwy 541 (It's before the Esso Station)	3. Turn left onto Hwy 940            This road may be seasonally closed	4. Continue onto Range Road for approx 10.5 Km and stop on the Right just after Etherington Creek
title: Cataract Creek West Loop
